languages.text: "Служители Адептус Администратум такие... блеклые. Словно сама жизнь во всей ее яркости и великолепии покинула их сердца".
"The Adeptus Administratum officials are so... wan. It is as if life itself, in all its vividness and splendour, has left their hearts."
languages.original_text: "Служители Адептус Администратум такие... блеклые. Словно сама жизнь во всей ее яркости и великолепии покинула их сердца".

traits.locale_text: "The Adeptus Administratum officials are so... wan. It is as if life itself, in all its vividness and splendour, has left their hearts."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Adeptus Administratum officials are so... wan. It is as if life itself, in all its vividness and splendour, has left their hearts."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Adeptus Administratum officials are so... wan. It is as if life itself, in all its vividness and splendour, has left their hearts."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Adeptus Administratum officials are so... wan. It is as if life itself, in all its vividness and splendour, has left their hearts."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “帝国内政部的官员看起来是如此……苍白，就好像他们的心里已经完全失去了生活本身的活力与灿烂。”
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Administratum officials are so... wan. It is as if life itself, in all its vividness and splendour, has left their hearts."

traits.locale_text: “帝国内政部的官员看起来是如此……苍白，就好像他们的心里已经完全失去了生活本身的活力与灿烂。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Les employés de l'Adeptus Administratum sont si... pâles. Comme si la vie elle-même, censément pleine de vigueur multicolore, avait quitté leur cœur. »
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Administratum officials are so... wan. It is as if life itself, in all its vividness and splendour, has left their hearts."

traits.locale_text: « Les employés de l'Adeptus Administratum sont si... pâles. Comme si la vie elle-même, censément pleine de vigueur multicolore, avait quitté leur cœur. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Los funcionarios del Adeptus Administratum son muy pálidos. Es como si la vida, con su energía y su esplendor, hubiera abandonado sus corazones».
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Administratum officials are so... wan. It is as if life itself, in all its vividness and splendour, has left their hearts."

traits.locale_text: «Los funcionarios del Adeptus Administratum son muy pálidos. Es como si la vida, con su energía y su esplendor, hubiera abandonado sus corazones».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「帝国行政局の役人は本当に…青白いです。まるで命そのものが、生々しさと輝きのすべてに向かい、心から抜け去ってしまったかのようです」
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Administratum officials are so... wan. It is as if life itself, in all its vividness and splendour, has left their hearts."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国行政局の役人は本当に…青白いです。まるで命そのものが、生々しさと輝きのすべてに向かい、心から抜け去ってしまったかのようです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Die Beamten im Adeptus Administratum sind so ... blass. Als ob das Leben selbst, mit all seiner Herrlichkeit und seinem Glanz, ihre Herzen verlassen hätte."
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Administratum officials are so... wan. It is as if life itself, in all its vividness and splendour, has left their hearts."

traits.locale_text: "Die Beamten im Adeptus Administratum sind so ... blass. Als ob das Leben selbst, mit all seiner Herrlichkeit und seinem Glanz, ihre Herzen verlassen hätte."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Administratum officials are so... wan. It is as if life itself, in all its vividness and splendour, has left their hearts."

languages.text: "Adeptus Administratum mensupları çok... Silik. Sanki yaşamın kendisi, tüm canlılığı ve ihtişamıyla birlikte yüreklerini terk etmiş gibiler."
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Administratum officials are so... wan. It is as if life itself, in all its vividness and splendour, has left their hearts."

traits.locale_text: "Adeptus Administratum mensupları çok... Silik. Sanki yaşamın kendisi, tüm canlılığı ve ihtişamıyla birlikte yüreklerini terk etmiş gibiler."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
